title: Freddy's nightmares dvd-r PAL R2
description:
FREDDY&#039;S NIGHTMARES DVD-R PAL R2

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

PLOT:


1)NO MORE MR. NICE GUY:
The sinister Freddy Krueger recounts the horrific
events that led to his burning by the angry
Springwood vigilate mob.

2)KILLER INSTINCT:
A high school track star who&#039;s lost her
competitive edge experiences the thrill of victory
and the painful agony of defeat when her coach
provides her with a talisman to help her not only
visualise winning, but focus on the gruesome
destruction of her opponents as well.

3)IT&#039;S A MISERABLE LIFE:
To most people a bullet to the head spells death,
but to these unfortunate drive-by shooting
victims, it becomes something far worse.
